title: WhatsApp API Based Restaurant Order System
description:
I'm seeking a developer to create a WhatsApp API-based order management system for my restaurant. The system should handle delivery orders exclusively with Google Sheets serving as the backend.

Key Features:
- Order Tracking: The system should allow for real-time tracking of each order.
- Automated Customer Responses: I need the system to have pre-set, automated responses to customer inquiries.
- Daily Order Summary: The system should generate a summary of orders at the end of each day.

Management of Order Details:
- All orders should be logged into a single Google Sheet.

Ideal Skills and Experience:
- Proficiency in API integration, particularly with WhatsApp.
- Prior experience in developing order management systems.
- Strong understanding of Google Sheets and its functionalities.
- Excellent programming skills, preferably in Python or JavaScript.
- Ability to create automated responses for customer interactions.
preview_description: I'm seeking a developer to create a WhatsApp API-based order management system for my restaurant. Th

title: Event Organizer Information Hub
description:
I am seeking a skilled web developer to create a comprehensive website aimed at providing information for various types of events, specifically concerts, conferences, and festivals. 

Key Features:
- The site will primarily serve to disseminate event-related information, including but not limited to, the event schedule and location details.
- Each event entry will need to be meticulously detailed, ensuring visitors can access pertinent information effortlessly.

Ideal Skills:
- Proficient in web development languages (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, etc.).
- Experience with creating user-friendly, intuitive website layouts.
- Knowledge of event management systems would be a plus.

I look forward to seeing your proposals.
preview_description: I am seeking a skilled web developer to create a comprehensive website aimed at providing informatio

title: Front-End Development for Mobile & Web App
description:
I'm looking for a top-tier front-end development team to create the mobile and web application front-end for my project. The focus must be on delivering pixel-perfect designs and high-quality, responsive user interfaces.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop the mobile application front-end for both Android and iOS using React Native (or similar technologies)
- Create a seamless and high-performance web front-end
- Implement animation effects as specified in our design system
- Ensure the application adheres to our established design system

Required Skills:
- Proficient in React Native (or similar technologies)
- Ability to write one-time code that works seamlessly on both Android and iOS
- Extensive experience with web front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
- Strong understanding of UI/UX principles with keen attention to detail
- Proficient with version control tools (e.g., Git)

If you and your team are passionate about delivering seamless and high-performance apps while following a design system, we would love to hear from you!

title: Review & Enhance Existing Chatbot – Logic, Performance, and Flow Optimization (Bid what you are willing to work!) ...
description:
PLEASE READ ALL FIRST! (Might be a longer term project)

Beside the teaching we could also use hel with making content for out socials on youtube, facebook and linedin:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/remcothart/
https://www.linkedin.com/company/kratoslab/


Project Overview:

We have a chatbot project that is already complete, but we need an experienced freelancer to review the logic, end-to-end flow, and overall performance. The goal is to identify any potential improvements in chatbot responses, enhance response time, and ensure smooth functionality across all scenarios.

Key Responsibilities:

1 - Review Existing Chatbot Logic & Flow: Analyze the chatbot's current logic and interaction flow to identify any gaps, inconsistencies, or inefficiencies.
2 - Enhance Chatbot Responses: Improve the chatbot’s ability to generate accurate and relevant responses using OpenAI, LLaMA, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
3 - Optimize Response Time: Identify performance bottlenecks and suggest improvements to reduce response delays.
4 - Test End-to-End Functionality: Conduct thorough testing to ensure that the chatbot handles all expected user inputs correctly and provides appropriate responses.
5 - Improve RAG Implementation: Review and refine the retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using LangChain and LangGraph.
6 - Debug & Optimize Backend Performance: Analyze API calls, response generation, and storage mechanisms for efficiency.
7 - Front-End Enhancements: Ensure seamless integration of chatbot UI using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.
8 - Documentation & Guidance: Provide feedback and documentation on changes made and recommendations for future improvements.

Requirements:
1 - Experience with Chatbot Development: Prior experience in building, reviewing, or optimizing chatbots.
2 - Proficiency in Relevant Technologies:
    Backend: Python, OpenAI, LLaMA, RAG, LangChain, LangGraph
    Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP
3 - Strong Understanding of AI/NLP: Ability to fine-tune LLaMA and optimize OpenAI API responses.
4 - Debugging & Performance Optimization Skills: Ability to analyze logs, identify bottlenecks, and optimize chatbot response times.
5 - End-to-End Testing Experience: Hands-on experience in testing chatbots for different scenarios and ensuring seamless flow.

Deliverables:

Comprehensive Review Report: Detailed insights on the current chatbot logic, potential issues, and areas of improvement.
Optimized Chatbot Logic: Necessary modifications and improvements implemented.
Performance Enhancement: Reduced response time and improved efficiency.
Final Testing & Documentation: Summary of enhancements made, test cases covered, and recommendations for future improvements.

!! IMPORTANT TEACHING NOTE !!
This is a teaching/instruction focused task. You will be explaining and demonstrating to another developer. All work must be done live with clear explanations and ensuring understanding.
preview_description:
PLEASE READ ALL FIRST! (Might be a longer term project)

Beside the teaching we could also use hel w

title: Informational Blog/Portfolio Website Development
description:
I'm looking to create a website that serves as an informational blog and portfolio. This website will primarily feature articles and blog posts. 

Ideal Skills:
- Web Development: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other relevant programming languages.
- UX/UI Design: Ability to create an engaging, user-friendly interface.
- SEO Knowledge: To optimize the site for search engines and increase visibility of the blog posts.
- Content Management Systems: Experience with WordPress or similar platforms.

Experience Required:
- Proven track record of developing similar websites.
- Strong portfolio showcasing previous web development and design projects.
- Experience with SEO and content management systems.
preview_description: I'm looking to create a website that serves as an informational blog and portfolio. This website wil

title: Logistics Website Development with Tracking System - 17/02/2025 05:48 EST
description:
I need a skilled web developer to create a logistics website similar to jetsealogistics.com. 

Core Features:
- Shipment Tracking: The website should have a robust shipment tracking system that provides real-time updates.
- Booking Services: The website should also have a user-friendly interface for booking services.
- Information and Contact Details: An essential part of the website is to provide comprehensive information about our services and easy access to contact details.

Ideal Skills:
- Proficiency in web development languages (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, etc.)
- Experience in creating e-commerce and logistics websites.
- Knowledge in developing real-time tracking systems.

Necessary Features in the Tracking System:
- Real-Time Updates: Customers should be able to see updates on their shipments in real-time.
-Customer Notifications: The system should send notifications to the customers at key points in the shipment process.
-Tracking History: Customers should have access to a history of their past shipments.

Experience in developing tracking systems and e-commerce websites is crucial. Please provide examples of similar projects you've worked on.
preview_description:
I need a skilled web developer to create a logistics website similar to jetsealogistics.com. 

Core

title: Javascript Page Migration to New Page using react/redux/typesctipt
description:
I need an experienced React/Redux/TypeScript developer to help migrate an old page to a new one based on a different site. The main goal of this migration is to implement a new design. 

The work will be done remotely on my system.

Key Responsibilities:
- Migrate an old page to a new one using React, Redux and TypeScript.
- Take reference from another website for the new design.
- Ensure the new page aligns with the design of the reference site.

Skills & Experience Required:
- Proficient in React, Redux and TypeScript.
- Previous experience with page migration and implementing new designs.
- Strong attention to detail to ensure the new page closely resembles the reference site.
preview_description: I need an experienced React/Redux/TypeScript developer to help migrate an old page to a new one base

title: Ezoic Expert for JavaScript (Standalone) Integration on a Custom Web Portal
description: We are looking for an Ezoic expert to help us integrate this advertising platform into our web portal. Our portal has been custom-developed, and the integration must be done exclusively via JavaScript (Standalone). We already have an in-house development team, so the professional will not be required to write code directly but will instead guide us step by step through the integration and approval process, providing clear instructions and ensuring the correct configuration. If you have experience with this type of integration and can support us in this activity, please contact us with a brief description of your experience and a price proposal.
preview_description: We are looking for an Ezoic expert to help us integrate this advertising platform into our web porta

title: Shopify Order Form Language Restriction
description:
I've encountered an issue on my Shopify website. Occasionally, customers place orders and input their names using Arabic letters. I need a solution that restricts the input in the order form to only English or German letters. 

Ideal Skills:
- Proficient in Shopify development
- Strong understanding of JavaScript for input validation
- Experience in e-commerce website customization
- Knowledge of linguistic character sets and input filtering
